data.title: 2024 Civic Sedan: Driving Fun
data.meta_description: The 2024 Honda Civic Sedan turns up the fun with a sporty ride, spacious cabin, and available Bose audio.
data.text:
Sport shown in Aegean Blue Metallic.

STYLING

LED Headlights

LED headlights come standard on every 2024 Civic Sedan, with a modern dual low-beam design.

Sport shown in Aegean Blue Metallic.

STYLING

18-Inch Gloss-Black Wheels

With trim-exclusive styling details like 18-inch gloss-black wheels, the Sport trim offers an added touch of attitude.

Sport shown in Aegean Blue Metallic.

STYLING

Fastback-Inspired Roofline

From the graceful swoop of the roofline to the elongated hood and clean body lines, the Civic Sedan casts a patently sporty silhouette.

Sport shown in Aegean Blue Metallic.

STYLING

LED Taillights

Using the latest LED technology, the angular taillights create a dramatic effect.

Sport shown in Aegean Blue Metallic.

STYLING

Chrome Exhaust Finisher

A chrome exhaust finisher gives the Sport trim a stylish, performance-inspired aesthetic.

Touring shown with Black Leather.

COCKPIT

Ergonomics

Everything in the cockpit is designed to make your drive more enjoyable, from the wide-open sightlines to the body-stabilizing driver’s seat and the simple, easily accessible controls.

Touring shown with Black Leather. Leather-trimmed seats standard on Touring.

COCKPIT

Leather-Trimmed Interior

The spacious cabin seats five and offers available leather-trimmed seats for added style and comfort.

Touring shown with Black Leather. Power front seats standard on Touring.

COCKPIT

8-Way Power Driver’s Seat

It’s easy to find a comfortable position in the 8-way power driver’s seat, which includes a lower cushion that tilts up and down.

Touring shown with Black Leather. Heated front seats standard on EX and Touring.

AMENITIES

Heated Front Seats

Heated seats help you warm up quickly. Whether you prefer a little heat or a lot, you and your front passenger can each choose from three heat levels.

Touring shown with Black Leather. One-touch power moonroof standard on EX and Touring.

AMENITIES

One-Touch Power Moonroof

Catch some fresh air and let in light with the power moonroof, which opens, closes, or tilts with a single touch.

Touring shown. Dual-zone automatic climate control standard on EX and Touring.

AMENITIES

Dual-Zone Climate Control

You and your front passenger can each find your own perfect temperature with the dual-zone automatic climate control system. You can set each side independently with separate knobs or sync them at the push of a button.

Touring shown with Black Leather. 60/40 split fold-down rear seatback standard on EX and Touring.

AMENITIES

60/40 Split Rear Seatback

The versatile 60/40 split fold-down rear seatback makes it easy to make more room for gear.

Sport shown in Rallye Red with HPD™ Package.

EXTERIOR ACCESSORIES

HPD™ Package

Add a custom, high-performance look to your Civic Sedan with this motorsports-inspired package, which includes an HPD™ decklid spoiler, HPD emblem, and HPD underbody spoilers.

Sport shown in Rallye Red with Honda Genuine Accessory 18-inch black alloy wheels.

EXTERIOR ACCESSORIES

18-Inch Black Alloy Wheels

Honda Genuine Accessory black alloy wheels feature a hub-centric design, which ensures an exact fit for wheel balance and creates less vibration to provide a smooth ride.

Sport shown in Rallye Red with Honda Genuine Accessory gloss-black emblems.

EXTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Gloss-Black Emblems

If attention to detail is important to you, then you’re sure to love the bold look of the gloss-black emblems. They not only complete the original unique exterior style of your Civic, but also accentuate it.

Sport shown with Honda Genuine Accessory 18-inch black alloy wheels and black wheel lug nuts.

EXTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Black Wheel Lug Nut Set

Create a different look with black wheel lug nuts that complement the Civic alloy wheels.

Sport shown in Rallye Red with Honda Genuine Accessories.

EXTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Splash Guard Set

Splash guards are a nice finishing touch. They give your Civic a great look and help protect your paint from chips and scratches. They’re custom fitted in the wheel wells to blend in with vehicle design, with a no-drill installation to help protect against corrosion.

Sport shown in Rallye Red with Honda Genuine Accessory door visors.

EXTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Door Visors

Enjoy some fresh air, even when the weather isn’t ideal, with door visors. Their durable polycarbonate material resists fading, and a no-drill installation helps protect against corrosion.

Sport shown with Honda Genuine Accessory contoured high-wall carpet floor mats.

INTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Contoured High-Wall Carpet Floor Mats

Contoured high-wall carpet floor mats offer protection, durability, and easy cleaning, all while maintaining the feeling of carpeting underfoot. They’re designed with surrounding walls that corral dirt and debris for simplified cleaning.

Sport shown in Rallye Red with Honda Genuine Accessory rear passenger window shades.

INTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Rear Passenger Window Shades

Designed by Honda engineers specifically for your new Honda, the rear passenger window shades provide added comfort for your rear-seated passengers by shielding them from the sun’s heat and glare.

Sport shown in Rallye Red with Honda Genuine Accessory trunk tray with dividers.

INTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Trunk Tray with Dividers

The trunk tray with dividers helps you store groceries, sporting goods, small luggage, and more. The moveable dividers are adjustable to add even more flexibility and convenience.

Sport shown in Rallye Red with Honda Genuine Accessory illuminated door sill trim.

INTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Illuminated Door Sill Trim

A subtle, tasteful, and upscale finishing touch, the illuminated door sill trim dresses up the interior while helping protect the lower door sill from scuff marks.

Sport shown in Rallye Red with Honda Genuine Accessory door sill protection film.

INTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Door Sill Protection Film

The door sill protection film helps provide the lower door sill with protection from scuffing.

Sport shown in Rallye Red with Honda Genuine Accessory cargo net.

INTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Cargo Net

The cargo net helps keep your grocery bags upright and holds most loose items securely in place. Tight-fitting elastic cord construction helps prevent damage to contents.

COCKPIT

Ergonomics

Everything in the cockpit is designed to make your drive more enjoyable, from the wide-open sightlines to the body-stabilizing driver’s seat and the simple, easily accessible controls.

COCKPIT

Leather-Trimmed Interior

The spacious cabin seats five and offers available leather-trimmed seats for added style and comfort.

COCKPIT

8-Way Power Driver’s Seat

It’s easy to find a comfortable position in the 8-way power driver’s seat, which includes a lower cushion that tilts up and down.

AMENITIES

Heated Front Seats

Heated seats help you warm up quickly. Whether you prefer a little heat or a lot, you and your front passenger can each choose from three heat levels.

AMENITIES

One-Touch Power Moonroof

Catch some fresh air and let in light with the power moonroof, which opens, closes, or tilts with a single touch.

AMENITIES

Dual-Zone Climate Control

You and your front passenger can each find your own perfect temperature with the dual-zone automatic climate control system. You can set each side independently with separate knobs or sync them at the push of a button.

AMENITIES

60/40 Split Rear Seatback

The versatile 60/40 split fold-down rear seatback makes it easy to make more room for gear.

EXTERIOR ACCESSORIES

HPD™ Package

Add a custom, high-performance look to your Civic Sedan with this motorsports-inspired package, which includes an HPD™ decklid spoiler, HPD emblem, and HPD underbody spoilers.

EXTERIOR ACCESSORIES

18-Inch Black Alloy Wheels

Honda Genuine Accessory black alloy wheels feature a hub-centric design, which ensures an exact fit for wheel balance and creates less vibration to provide a smooth ride.

EXTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Gloss-Black Emblems

If attention to detail is important to you, then you’re sure to love the bold look of the gloss-black emblems. They not only complete the original unique exterior style of your Civic, but also accentuate it.

EXTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Black Wheel Lug Nut Set

Create a different look with black wheel lug nuts that complement the Civic alloy wheels.

EXTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Splash Guard Set

Splash guards are a nice finishing touch. They give your Civic a great look and help protect your paint from chips and scratches. They’re custom fitted in the wheel wells to blend in with vehicle design, with a no-drill installation to help protect against corrosion.

EXTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Door Visors

Enjoy some fresh air, even when the weather isn’t ideal, with door visors. Their durable polycarbonate material resists fading, and a no-drill installation helps protect against corrosion.

INTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Contoured High-Wall Carpet Floor Mats

Contoured high-wall carpet floor mats offer protection, durability, and easy cleaning, all while maintaining the feeling of carpeting underfoot. They’re designed with surrounding walls that corral dirt and debris for simplified cleaning.

INTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Rear Passenger Window Shades

Designed by Honda engineers specifically for your new Honda, the rear passenger window shades provide added comfort for your rear-seated passengers by shielding them from the sun’s heat and glare.

INTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Trunk Tray with Dividers

The trunk tray with dividers helps you store groceries, sporting goods, small luggage, and more. The moveable dividers are adjustable to add even more flexibility and convenience.

INTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Illuminated Door Sill Trim

A subtle, tasteful, and upscale finishing touch, the illuminated door sill trim dresses up the interior while helping protect the lower door sill from scuff marks.

INTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Door Sill Protection Film

The door sill protection film helps provide the lower door sill with protection from scuffing.

INTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Cargo Net

The cargo net helps keep your grocery bags upright and holds most loose items securely in place. Tight-fitting elastic cord construction helps prevent damage to contents.

Turbocharged engine standard on EX and Touring.

ENGINEERING

180-hp Turbocharged Engine

Whether you’re accelerating from a standstill or passing at speed, the 180-horsepower* engine delivers a forceful response.

2.0-liter, 158-hp engine standard on LX and Sport.

ENGINEERING

158-hp Engine

The 2.0-liter, 158-horsepower* DOHC i-VTEC® engine pairs responsive acceleration with smart fuel-saving technology like idle-stop.

Sport shown in Crystal Black Pearl.

ENGINEERING

Sporty Handling

A sport-tuned MacPherson strut front suspension and multi-link rear suspension make every corner a cause for excitement.

Sport shown in Sonic Gray Pearl.*

ENGINEERING

Smooth Acceleration

Using a continuously variable transmission (CVT), the Civic Sedan provides a nimble response to your pedal action.

Sport shown with Black Leather. Paddle shifters standard on Sport and Touring.

DRIVING EXPERIENCE

Paddle Shifters

Take control of the transmission’s shift points with the steering wheel-mounted paddle shifters. Downshift for some extra passing power or shift up on the open highway, all without taking your hands off the wheel.

Touring shown with Black Leather. 3-mode drive system standard on Sport and Touring. Sport and ECON modes standard on all trims.

DRIVING EXPERIENCE

3-Mode Drive System

At the push of a button, you can find a driving mode that suits your mood, from the gas-sipping ECON mode to the highly responsive Sport mode.

Touring shown with Black Leather. 7-inch driver information interface standard on LX, Sport, and EX. 10.2-inch driver information interface standard on Touring.

DRIVING EXPERIENCE

Driver Information Interface

The driver information interface features customizable gauges and an intuitive layout, aligned with the steering wheel-mounted controls.

Sport shown.

DRIVING EXPERIENCE

Sport Pedals

Bring a dash of racing-inspired style to the Sport trim’s interior.

Touring shown with Black Leather. Leather-wrapped steering wheel standard on Sport and above.

OVERVIEW

Leather-Wrapped Steering Wheel

Get a comfortable grip on every drive with the soft yet durable leather-wrapped steering wheel.

DRIVING EXPERIENCE

Paddle Shifters

Take control of the transmission’s shift points with the steering wheel-mounted paddle shifters. Downshift for some extra passing power or shift up on the open highway, all without taking your hands off the wheel.

DRIVING EXPERIENCE

3-Mode Drive System

At the push of a button, you can find a driving mode that suits your mood, from the gas-sipping ECON mode to the highly responsive Sport mode.

DRIVING EXPERIENCE

Driver Information Interface

The driver information interface features customizable gauges and an intuitive layout, aligned with the steering wheel-mounted controls.

DRIVING EXPERIENCE

Sport Pedals

Bring a dash of racing-inspired style to the Sport trim’s interior.

DRIVING EXPERIENCE

Leather-Wrapped Steering Wheel

Get a comfortable grip on every drive with the soft yet durable leather-wrapped steering wheel.

Touring shown with Black Leather. Wireless Apple CarPlay® compatibility standard on Touring.

CONNECTIVITY

Apple CarPlay® Compatibility

Connect your iPhone® to use your favorite map, audio, and messaging apps through the touch-screen.* And with available wireless compatibility, you can also connect without the cable.

Touring shown with Black Leather. Wireless Android Auto™ compatibility standard on Touring.

CONNECTIVITY

Android Auto™ Compatibility

Use your compatible Android™ phone to access directions, text messages, and your music library through the touch-screen.* Available wireless compatibility lets you connect from anywhere in the car—no cable necessary.

Touring shown with Black Leather. Honda Satellite-Linked Navigation System™ standard on Touring.

CONNECTIVITY

Navigation System

The Honda Satellite-Linked Navigation System™* uses offline maps, so you’ll always be able to find your way even in areas without a cell phone signal. In addition to directions, it also features lane guidance to help you prepare for upcoming turns.

Touring shown with Black Leather. Wireless phone charger standard on Touring.

CONNECTIVITY

Wireless Phone Charger

No more cords. No more adapters. The wireless phone charger provides a hassle-free charging zone that’s easy to use with compatible phones.*

CONNECTIVITY

HondaLink®

The HondaLink® app* makes it easy to check your vehicle’s mileage, fuel range, and oil life remotely, and even schedule service appointments. See details here.

Touring shown. Blind spot information system with cross traffic monitor standard on Touring.

Peace of Mind

Blind Spot Information System

The blind spot information system with cross traffic monitor* can detect and alert you to the presence of other vehicles to the side of your Civic Sedan and alert you to approaching vehicles detected when you’re backing up.

Touring shown.

Peace of Mind

Multi-Angle Rearview Camera

Choose from three different angles—normal, top-down, and wide—for a better view of what’s behind you whenever you shift into Reverse.*

Touring shown in Meteorite Gray Metallic. Walk Away Auto Lock® standard on Sport and above.

Peace of Mind

Walk Away Auto Lock®

After you park and shut the doors, just walk away from the Civic Sedan with the key fob to lock up automatically. When you come back, you can unlock just by grabbing one of the front-door handles.

CONNECTIVITY

Apple CarPlay® Compatibility

Connect your iPhone® to use your favorite map, audio, and messaging apps through the touch-screen.* And with available wireless compatibility, you can also connect without the cable.

CONNECTIVITY

Android Auto™ Compatibility

Use your compatible Android™ phone to access directions, text messages, and your music library through the touch-screen.* Available wireless compatibility lets you connect from anywhere in the car—no cable necessary.

CONNECTIVITY

Navigation System

The Honda Satellite-Linked Navigation System™* uses offline maps, so you’ll always be able to find your way even in areas without a cell phone signal. In addition to directions, it also features lane guidance to help you prepare for upcoming turns.

CONNECTIVITY

Wireless Phone Charger

No more cords. No more adapters. The wireless phone charger provides a hassle-free charging zone that’s easy to use with compatible phones.*

CONNECTIVITY

HondaLink®

The HondaLink® app* makes it easy to check your vehicle’s mileage, fuel range, and oil life remotely, and even schedule service appointments. See details here.
